Plot: Danzig in the 1920s/1930s. Oskar Matzerath, son of a local dealer, is a most unusual boy. Equipped with full intellect right from his birth he decides at his third birthday not to grow up ...
Language: German, Italian, Hebrew, Polish, Russian, Latin
Title: The Tin Drum
Writer: Jean-Claude Carrière, Günter Grass (additional dialogue), Günter Grass (novel), Volker Schlöndorff, Franz Seitz
Actors: Mario Adorf, Angela Winkler, David Bennent, Katharina Thalbach
